.. _create_spatvector_object_from_dfr:
``create_spatvector_object_from_dfr``
=========================================

Create terra spatvector object from a data.frame

Description
-----------

create terra spatvector from a data.frame

Usage
-----

.. code-block:: r

   create_spatvector_object_from_dfr(x)

Arguments
---------

.. list-table::
   :header-rows: 1

   * - Argument
     - Description
   * - ``x``
     - data.frame object
